Message:
That lady’s presentation
was a huge hit.

Everyone was drawn
into that cake...
I have no chance
at winning now...

As I stood there feeling down,
someone quietly appeared
beside me, and started
talking to me.

“There’s nothing more beautiful
than seeing someone doing
their best for the person
most special to them. Look.”

In that moment,
as the lady stood on stage,
she muttered something
to herself.

“I hope he can see this,
all the way from Heaven...”

...Aaah, I see. She’s also doing
this for someone special to her...

That’s why everyone
was so moved.
They all resonated
with her feelings.

That’s right. The stuffed bear
Big Sis gave me might be
slightly misshapen.

But to me, it’s my most
prized possession.

“I feel a lot more
confident now.
Thank you!”

“Good luck. I look forward
to hearing about the feelings
you want to share♪”
